logger.info("**************************************************************************")
logger.info("\t MDM - CATEGORY  - OMT -PRIM - CAT - TREE - Starting with below parameters")
logger.info("*************************************************************************")
logger.info("\t SOURCE_MERCH_CATEGORY_TREE_LAKE_PATH : {0}".format(SOURCE_MERCH_CATEGORY_TREE_LAKE_PATH))
logger.info("\t STAGE_MERCH_CATEGORY_TREE_PATH : {0}".format(STAGE_MERCH_CATEGORY_TREE_PATH))
logger.info("\t TARGET_MERCH_CATEGORY_TREE_PATH : {0}".format(TARGET_MERCH_CATEGORY_TREE_PATH))
logger.info("\t OPCO_LST : {0}".format(OPCO_LST))
logger.info("\t VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD : {0}".format(VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD))
logger.info("**************************************************************************")

from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, StringType,TimestampType, IntegerType, LongType, DecimalType, BooleanType, DateType, ArrayType

STAGE_MERCH_CATEGORY_TREE_SCHEMA = StructType([
    StructField("prim_cat_tree_id", LongType(), True),
    StructField("tree_id", IntegerType(), False),
    StructField("seq_id", IntegerType(), False),
    StructField("chld_cat_id", LongType(), False),
    StructField("parn_cat_tree_id", LongType(), True),
    StructField("actv_cd", StringType(), False),
    StructField("audt_cr_dt_tm", TimestampType(), False),
    StructField("audt_cr_user_cd", StringType(), False),
    StructField("audt_upd_dt_tm", TimestampType(), True),
    StructField("audt_upd_user_cd", StringType(), False)
    ])

logger.debug("\t schema-defination : Defined the schema for catalog_prod:omt_prim_cat_tree.\n {0}".format(STAGE_MERCH_CATEGORY_TREE_SCHEMA))

from delta.tables import DeltaTable
from pyspark.sql.functions import current_timestamp, lit

if(DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_MERCH_CATEGORY_TREE_PATH)):
    mssparkutils.fs.rm(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_MERCH_CATEGORY_TREE_PATH, recurse = True)
    logger.info("\t Purging data from STG container {0}".format(STAGE_MERCH_CATEGORY_TREE_PATH))



df_prod_ctr_tree_stage = spark \
    .read \
    .format("parquet") \
    .schema(STAGE_MERCH_CATEGORY_TREE_SCHEMA) \
    .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + SOURCE_MERCH_CATEGORY_TREE_LAKE_PATH) \
    .withColumnRenamed("audt_cr_dt_tm", "src_audt_cr_dt_tm") \
    .withColumnRenamed("audt_cr_user_cd", "src_audt_cr_user_cd") \
    .withColumnRenamed("audt_upd_dt_tm", "src_audt_upd_dt_tm") \
    .withColumnRenamed("audt_upd_user_cd", "src_audt_upd_user_cd") \
    .withColumn("tgt_audt_cr_dt_tm", current_timestamp()) \
    .withColumn("tgt_audt_upd_dt_tm", current_timestamp()) \
    .withColumn("tgt_audt_cr_user_cd", lit('usr-data-integration')) \
    .withColumn("tgt_audt_upd_user_cd", lit('usr-data-integration')) 
   


df_prod_ctr_tree_stage \
    .sort(KEY_COL) \
    .write \
    .format("delta") \
    .option("inferSchema","True")\
    .mode("overwrite") \
    .save(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_MERCH_CATEGORY_TREE_PATH)    

logger.info("\t stg-load: Created STG data from lake source. \n LAKE = {0} \n STG = {1} \n CNT = {2}".format(SOURCE_MERCH_CATEGORY_TREE_LAKE_PATH, STAGE_MERCH_CATEGORY_TREE_PATH, df_prod_ctr_tree_stage.count()))

from delta.tables import DeltaTable

def load_master_data(df_stage, path, opco):
    df_stage\
           .sort(KEY_COL) \
           .write \
           .option("mergeSchema", "True") \
           .mode("overwrite") \
           .format("delta") \
           .save(path)
    logger.info("\t CATALOG_PROD:OMT_PRIM_CAT_TREE Master data overwrite.OPCO = {0}, Count={1}".format(opco, df_stage.count()))

def apply_cdc():
    logger.info("\t Delta master load")
    dt_prod_ctr_tree_master = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_MERCH_CATEGORY_TREE_PATH.format(opco = opco))
    logger.info("\t CATALOG_PROD:OMT_PRIM_CAT_TREE loaded from master. OPCO = {0}, Count={1}".format(opco, dt_prod_ctr_tree_master.toDF().count()))

    dt_prod_ctr_tree_master.alias("mstr") \
    .merge(df_prod_ctr_tree_stage.alias("stg"), "mstr.prim_cat_tree_id = stg.prim_cat_tree_id") \
    .whenMatchedUpdateAll() \
    .whenNotMatchedInsertAll() \
    .execute()

    logger.info("\t CATALOG_PROD:OMT_PRIM_CAT_TREE merged delta records to main file. OPCO = {0}, Count={1}".format(opco, df_prod_ctr_tree_stage.count()))
def init():
        logger.info('\t First Time Master Load')
        load_master_data(df_prod_ctr_tree_stage,BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_MERCH_CATEGORY_TREE_PATH.format(opco = opco),opco)

##############################

# FULL LOAD / DELTA LOAD

##############################
for opco in OPCO_LST:
    logger.info("\t Processing MASTER for CTR TREE - OPCO={0}".format(opco))
    if(DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_MERCH_CATEGORY_TREE_PATH.format(opco = opco)) == False):
        init()
    else:
        apply_cdc()
